Literature.Title: The antimicrobial peptide SAAP-148 combats drug-resistant bacteria and biofilms.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus JAR060131(LC=1.6µM),Staphylococcus aureus JAR060131(LC=12.8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(LC=1.6µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(LC=12.8µM)
